commit.message:
cfgrtl.c (rtl_flow_call_edges_add): Update profile.

	* cfgrtl.c (rtl_flow_call_edges_add): Update profile.
	* tree-cfg.c (gimple_flow_call_edges_add): Likewise.
	* profile-count.h (max_safe_multiplier): Make unsigned.
	(profile_count::guessed_zero): New.

From-SVN: r249869
